code: public void testSerialization() throws IOException {     final Authentication authentication = new Authentication(new User("joe", "a role"), new RealmRef("realm", "native", "node1"), null).     final int seconds = randomIntBetween(0, Math.toIntExact(TimeValue.timeValueMinutes(30L).getSeconds())).     final Instant expirationTime = Clock.systemUTC().instant().plusSeconds(seconds).     final UserToken userToken = new UserToken(authentication, expirationTime).     BytesStreamOutput output = new BytesStreamOutput().     userToken.writeTo(output).     final UserToken serialized = new UserToken(output.bytes().streamInput()).     assertEquals(authentication, serialized.getAuthentication()).     assertEquals(expirationTime, serialized.getExpirationTime()). }
